head.title: selector-attribute-operator-space-after
head.description: selector-attribute-operator-space-after Require a single space or disallow whitespace after operators within attribute selectors. Options…

body:
#selector-attribute-operator-space-after

Require a single space or disallow whitespace after operators within attribute selectors.

.foo[target= _blank]
/**         ↑    
 * The space after operator */

#Options

string: "always"|"never"

#"always"

There must always be a single after after the operator.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

[target=_blank] {}
[target =_blank] {}
[target='_blank'] {}
[target="_blank"] {}
[target ='_blank'] {}
[target ="_blank"] {}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

[target] {}
[target= _blank] {}
[target= '_blank'] {}
[target= "_blank"] {}
[target = _blank] {}
[target = '_blank'] {}
[target = "_blank"] {}

#"never"

There must never be a single after after the operator.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

[target= _blank] {}
[target = _blank] {}
[target= '_blank'] {}
[target= "_blank"] {}
[target = '_blank'] {}
[target = "_blank"] {}

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

[target] {}
[target=_blank] {}
[target='_blank'] {}
[target="_blank"] {}
[target =_blank] {}
[target ='_blank'] {}
[target ="_blank"] {}
rawBody:
# selector-attribute-operator-space-after

Require a single space or disallow whitespace after operators within attribute selectors.

```css
.foo[target= _blank]
/**         ↑    
 * The space after operator */
```

## Options

`string`: `"always"|"never"`

### `"always"`

There *must always* be a single after after the operator.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
[target=_blank] {}
```

```css
[target =_blank] {}
```

```css
[target='_blank'] {}
```

```css
[target="_blank"] {}
```

```css
[target ='_blank'] {}
```

```css
[target ="_blank"] {}
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
[target] {}
```

```css
[target= _blank] {}
```

```css
[target= '_blank'] {}
```

```css
[target= "_blank"] {}
```

```css
[target = _blank] {}
```

```css
[target = '_blank'] {}
```

```css
[target = "_blank"] {}
```

### `"never"`

There *must never* be a single after after the operator.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
[target= _blank] {}
```

```css
[target = _blank] {}
```

```css
[target= '_blank'] {}
```

```css
[target= "_blank"] {}
```

```css
[target = '_blank'] {}
```

```css
[target = "_blank"] {}
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
[target] {}
```

```css
[target=_blank] {}
```

```css
[target='_blank'] {}
```

```css
[target="_blank"] {}
```

```css
[target =_blank] {}
```

```css
[target ='_blank'] {}
```

```css
[target ="_blank"] {}
```

---
title: selector-attribute-operator-space-after
---

# selector-attribute-operator-space-after

Require a single space or disallow whitespace after operators within attribute selectors.

```css
.foo[target= _blank]
/**         ↑    
 * The space after operator */
```

## Options

`string`: `"always"|"never"`

### `"always"`

There *must always* be a single after after the operator.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

```css
[target=_blank] {}
```

```css
[target =_blank] {}
```

```css
[target='_blank'] {}
```

```css
[target="_blank"] {}
```

```css
[target ='_blank'] {}
```

```css
[target ="_blank"] {}
```

The following patterns are *not* considered warnings:

```css
[target] {}
```

```css
[target= _blank] {}
```


```css
[target= "_blank"] {}
```



### `"never"`

There *must never* be a single after after the operator.


